title: Pirelli P7 Sport clincher all-season road bike tire is grippy, durable & way more affordable
content:
Need a tire that rides like a performance road bike tire but holds up to long base miles and crappy surfaces? The new Pirelli P7 Sport borrows their Pro rubber compound and a tread pattern inspired by the top-level P ZERO Race, then adds protective casing layers underneath.
